name: Emily Smith
text: Best place in the Tuscaloosa area to go for a car battery!! I was in and out in ten minutes for much cheaper then any chain auto store and had great service. Definitely go to Dixie Battery!!

name: Trailryder
text: Very nice people good prices on both new and used batteries of all types including marine batteries. Will install battery for a 5 dollar fee as well and buy old batteries as well. Highly recommended.

name: Fornina Allen
text: It felt luke the coldest day of the millennium, but they took great care of my needs!😊

name: Jeffery Leonard
text: Great service , great folks ...thank you for the service

name: Sarah Levins
text: Mark at Dixie Battery is amazing! Always able to answer any question and quote any battery type off the top of his head! Also, more than willing to go out of his way to help however he can! THANKS!!!!

name: chris mills
text: GREAT SERVICE , SEEMED VERY NICE !

name: chuck les
text: Great batteries for your vehicle. On year three with one their reconditioned batteries, it still works great at less half the price of new.

name: Herman l Jackson jr
text: The workers are nice, the prices are good

name: Angelo Ash
text: Great service!!!!

name: Mattie Gaitoryoung
text: Very nice young man check my 🚗 put my battery in my car thank you. I said no thank you

text: Best damnn battery store there is.

text: Friendly staff, fast service

text: Helpful people.

text: Reasonable prices

name: Ashley Harris
text: Best Prices

name: Hilton Mason
text: Terrible respect

name: Ben Golston
text: Love it

name: Mark M
text: No one in Tuscaloosa has better prices on new & used batteries.

name: Brandon Lee
text:
***WARNING***
These people are liars. Their batteries are not 18 month warranty but merely 12 months. Then on top of that the brand they carry, U.S. Battery, has a lousy warranty. My 6 volt batteries purchased 11/2018(3months)have severe amp loss. Fighting with U.S. Battery on getting replaced. Just go to someone else, even Interstate has a better battery. STAY AWAY.

name: Charles Williams
text: Good service great price

name: Michael Smith
text: Best place to buy a battery in Mobile, AL.

name: Edwin Gunter
text:
Good batteries for the cheapest price in town... also great if you want to just sell a battery!
Hours 7:30AM-4:30 pm on the dot. If you are a second late, don’t expect them to be there! Monday-Friday

name: Chucri Jalkh
text: Great prices.

name: thomas walton
text:
Very fast friendly service and great prices.
I do a lot of business with them and through my company and recommend them everyone.

name: JudaYork FWRealtor
text: They had exactly what I was looking for and the phone service was outstanding. The six batteries were not strapped together. It is not the owners fault because I should have checked them when the truck bumped around coming out of the parking lot. I had never seen a battery that was shaped that it would fall over. Anyway.. check your batteries before you drive off. The battery acid spilled out of four batteries all over the truck. Again, not the owners fault that I had to drive two hours to get home but there was quite a bit of damage to my truck.

name: Greg V
text: Great prices awesome people

name: Marina K. Sintros
text: Good people, Fair prices.

name: Diane Crismon Jenkins
text: Take advantage of women!
